Title: River of Fundament

Actors: Dave Bald Eagle, Milford Graves, John Buffalo Mailer, Ellen Burstyn
Plot: In 2007, Matthew Barney and Jonathan Bepler began a new collaborative project inspired by American author Norman Mailer's 1983 novel Ancient Evenings, set in pharaonic Egypt. The project ...
